sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import Navbar from "../../../components/Navbar"; import AdminPanel from "../../../components/AdminPanel"; import Footer from "../../../components/Footer"; import { Link, useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import { Buffer } from "buffer"; import axios from "axios"; const AdminProductsView = () => { const { id } = useParams(); // const id = "65cb6045375f981ed80b0f7d"; const [message, setMessage] = useState(""); const [product, setProduct] = useState(null); const apiUrl = window.location.origin.includes("localhost") ? `http://localhost:5000/admin/products/${id}` : `https://khamco-shop-backend.onrender.com/admin/products/${id}`; const [openDialog, setOpenDialog] = useState(false); const [display, setDisplay] = useState(false); const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(true); useEffect(() => { document.title = "Admin Product Details - Khamco Shop"; const fetchData = async () => { await axios .get(apiUrl) .then((response) => { console.log(response.data); setProduct(response.data.product); setIsLoading(false); setDisplay(true); }) .catch((error) => { setIsLoading(true); setDisplay(false); setMessage(error.message); }); }; return () => { fetchData(); }; }, [apiUrl]); return ( <>

{message}

All Products
{isLoading &&

Loading...

} {display && (
{product && ( <>

{product.name}

ID

{product._id}

 Quantity

{product.quantity} meters

 Price

KWD{" "} {new Intl.NumberFormat("en-US").format(product.price)}

Cost

KWD{" "} {new Intl.NumberFormat("en-US").format(product.cost)}

Category

{product.category}

 Date

{new Date(product.date).toLocaleDateString("en-us", { month: "long", year: "numeric", day: "numeric", })}

)}
)}
); }; export default AdminProductsView;
